title: Channel Islands National Park: Goods & Services
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Goods & Services              Goods & Services         Â    There are no goods or services available on the islands. Limited food service is available on Island Packer boats.  Visitors must bring all their own food, water, and other supplies. Public phones are not available. For goods and services in Ventura, Oxnard, and Santa Barbara contact:  Ventura Visitor and Convention Bureau   Oxnard Visitor and Convention Bureau    Santa Barbara Visitor and Convention Bureau
